common.name: Twinblade Goblin
common.flavour_text: Specialists recently recorded evidence of a goblin dual-wielding swords. While it is not uncommon for monsters to adopt tools, the multi-tasking potential displayed is reportedly a first for goblinkind. Researchers excitedly await evolutions to come.
common.skill_text: Fanfare: If there's a super-evolved allied follower on the field, select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 4 damage.

evo.flavour_text: Real lucky I found me an extra sword! Now if I hack one apple down with this hand, and then one down with that hand, I got me, errrrg... one... plus one... TWO BREAKFASTS!
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: If there's a super-evolved allied follower on the field, select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 4 damage.

common.name: Monster Litterateur
common.flavour_text: January dons a skirt of pines, February veils itself in ume blooms, and March blushes in sakura fair. April threads wisteria through its hair. May's eyes shine with iris light; June's lips are peony bright. Yet six months of growth anew could not add up to the garden of you.
common.skill_text: Fanfare: If there's another 1-base-cost card on the field, give this follower +1/+1.

evo.flavour_text: Pluck July's clovers for luck, August's wheat for wealth and September's mums for lasting health. October grieves passion's falling leaves; willows weep in November and the purple empress is crowned in December. Every plant finds its meaning in the garden of the mind.
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: If there's another 1-base-cost card on the field, give this follower +1/+1.

common.name: World of Games
common.flavour_text: The lost Flower Kami spirit their most beloved mortals away, trapping them in a world of games. Players must win back their freedom—or sink with the Kami into a fading dream.

questions.question: The only card on my field is a World of Games with a count of 5, and the only enemy card on the field is a Quake Goliath. If I play Divine Thunder, what will World of Games's count be?

evo.flavour_text: To create a world where the embers of war have long since burned out, I march on. Those who would seek to snuff out my ambitious flame in their contempt will need to face my steel.

questions.question: If I play Ruby, Greedy Cherub when it's the only card in my hand, will its Fanfare ability activate?
questions.answer: Yes. You will draw a card without returning one to your deck.

questions.question: If I use Ruby, Greedy Cherub to return a Blaze Destroyer whose cost has been reduced to 5 by its On Spellboost ability from my hand to my deck, will the Blaze Destroyer still cost 5 when I redraw it?
questions.answer: Yes. Cards returned from hand to deck retain effects applied to them.

questions.question: If I return a Rusty, Luxcard Trickster with Storm from my hand to my deck with Ruby, Greedy Cherub, will the Rusty still have Storm when I redraw it?
questions.answer: Yes. Cards returned from hand to deck retain effects applied to them.

When this card is Invoked, gain Crest: Sandalphon, Primarch Successor and return this card to hand. Fanfare: Super Skybound Art - Do this 5 times: "Deal 2 damage to a random enemy."

questions.question: I Invoke a Sandalphon, Primarch Successor whose cost has been reduced to 3 by Fennie, Prismatic Phoenix's Fanfare ability. When he is returned to my hand by his ability, what does his cost become?
questions.answer: His cost becomes 6. When a card is returned to hand, any prior changes to its cost are removed.

questions.question: I play Sandalphon, Primarch Successor while there are 4 enemy copies of Fairy on the field. Is the likelihood that Sandalphon's Super Skybound Art ability targets the enemy leader affected by the number of enemy followers on the field?
questions.answer: Yes. Each activation of "Deal 2 damage to a random enemy" selects a random target from the available targets, so since there are 5 available targets, there's a 20% chance of selecting the enemy leader. If a Fairy is selected and destroyed, the following activation will have a 25% chance of selecting the enemy leader, and so on until all 5 activations have been resolved.

questions.question: I have a Sandalphon, Primarch Successor in my deck ready to be invoked and Crest: Titania, Queen of Fairies. In what order will abilities resolve at the start of my turn?
questions.answer: First, Crest: Titania, Queen of Fairies will add a Fairy to your hand. Then, Sandalphon's Invoke ability summons him to your field. His "When this card is invoked" ability then returns him to your hand. Finally, you'll draw your card for the turn.

questions.question: I have a Sandalphon, Primarch Successor in my deck ready to be invoked and a Serene Sanctuary with a count of 1 on my field. In what order will abilities resolve at the start of my turn?
questions.answer: First, Serene Sanctuary's count falls to 0 and it is destroyed. Then, Sandalphon's Invoke ability summons him to your field. Next, Serene Sanctuary's Last Words ability activates and you draw 2 cards. Sandalphon's "When this card is invoked" ability then returns him to your hand. Finally, you'll draw your card for the turn.

questions.question: I have a Sandalphon, Primarch Successor in my deck ready to be invoked and a Pact of the Beast Princess with a count of 1 and 4 copies of Holy Falcon on my field. In what order will abilities resolve at the start of my turn?
questions.answer: First, Pact of the Beast Princess's count falls to 0 and it is destroyed. Then, Sandalphon's Invoke ability summons him to your field. Next, Pact of the Beast Princess's Last Words ability activates, but because your field is full, it cannot summon a Holyflame Tiger. Sandalphon's "When this card is invoked" ability then returns him to your hand. Finally, you'll draw your card for the turn.

evo.flavour_text: What makes the sky blue? You were so captivated by the question that grew into a wish. You wanted to see where evolution would lead. So I'll follow that path in your stead.

Activates in deck. At the start of your turn, if allied followers have evolved at least 6 times this match, Invoke this card.

questions.question: If I super-evolve a Quake Goliath with Olivia, Heroic Dark Angel's Super-Evolve ability, will the Quake Goliath gain the same abilities given to followers super-evolved using SEP (during your turn, it can't be destroyed by abilities, and damage it takes is reduced to 0; whenever it attacks and destroys an enemy follower, 1 damage is dealt to the enemy leader)?
If I super-evolve Arriet, Luxminstrel with Olivia, Heroic Dark Angel's Super-Evolve ability, will Arriet's Evolve and Super-Evolve abilities activate?
questions.answer: No. Evolve abilities only activate when the follower is evolved or super-evolved using EP or SEP. Super-Evolve abilities only activate when the follower is super-evolved using SEP.

Fanfare: Select a Mode to activate. 1. Add 2 copies of Fairy to your hand. 2. Recover 2 play points. 3. Deal 3 damage split between all enemy followers.

Himmel, why did you recruit me?
—Frieren

It's what Himmel the Hero would've done.
—Frieren

common.name: Fragrantwood Whispers
common.flavour_text: He is wind. He is solace. He is fellowship. To the congregation of faithful, his is the voice of divine love.

common.name: Quiet Encouragement

common.skill_text: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Combo (3) - Deal 2 damage instead.

common.name: Grace of the Swarmpetal
common.flavour_text: Hehe. How shall I bind you to me? Oh, don't be afraid. I prefer honey to webs. We'll play games day in and day out... until you can't love anything but me!
common.skill_text: Draw X cards. X is your Combo.

common.name: Godwood Staff
common.flavour_text: I passed through fire and ice to reach the throne. I overcame trials in the Labyrinth of Roots. I was chosen by the Godwood Staff. That doesn't mean I'm free of doubts... But I believe that with time and with toil, I can finally prove I'm worthy of my people!
common.skill_text:
At the end of your turn, Combo (3) - Draw a card.
Engage: Destroy this card. Select another allied card on the field and return it to hand.

questions.question: Can I engage Godwood Staff even if there aren't any allied followers on the field?
questions.answer: Yes. Doing so will simply destroy it.

common.name: Hamlet of Unkilling
common.flavour_text: I overhear her berating herself quite often. "How does anyone put up with me?" "I'm no good at anything." "Why am I always so useless?" "Stop... why can't it stop?" "I hate it. I hate myself." —The Memoir of a Ritual Keeper, 3
common.skill_text:

common.name: Gentle Treant
common.flavour_text: Neither plant nor animal, a lonely treant waits for his only visitor, a strange bird with opaline feathers whose colors play in the light. His leafy crown perks up as he hears a sound—not the soft flap of wings, but the crunch of a poacher's boot.

Fanfare: Combo (3) - Evolve this follower.
Strike: Restore 2 defense to your leader.

evo.flavour_text: The poacher has come for the bird, its iridescent feathers. Cracking his not-branches and not-roots, the treant defends his only friend, realizing at last what he is. Not a plant or animal, but a home. And from then on, the lonely treant is lonely no more.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Combo (3) - Evolve this follower.
Strike: Restore 2 defense to your leader.

common.name: Elder Sagebrush
common.flavour_text: Monks train on high mountains because it brings them closer to the gods. But there is also much wisdom to be found down in shaded forests and secret groves, where one can hear the living pulse of Mother Earth.
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower. Combo (3) - Deal damage to 3 random enemy followers instead.

evo.flavour_text: Settle down now, sprout. How do you expect to learn anything through all that dang susurration? Back in my day, seedlings knew when to rustle and when to keep well silent...

"Your Majesty... I dedicate my life to your service."
"O-oh, I—thank you so much, Cynthia!"

common.flavour_text: You've done well to enter these lands, traveler. Only the purest of heart can see the fairy realm. You're welcome to serve in my court, and by "welcome" I mean "I'm the queen 'round these parts." Capisce? ...What do you mean, I don't sound like a queen?!

Fanfare: Summon a Fairy. Gain Crest: Titania, Queen of Fairies.
Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and transform it into a Fairy.

evo.flavour_text: The fairy queen Titania, ruler of the fae—her love and generosity know no bounds, but above all, she possesses unrivalled curiosity. She's particularly intrigued by the elf queen, the dimension-shifting witch, and other odd fellows from distant realms.
evo.skill_text:

common.name: Greatwood Warrior

evo.flavour_text: If the elves are century-old trees, we're annual flowers that bloom and wilt yearly. Not to say that one's better than the other, though. After all, a diverse forest's a healthy one.

common.flavour_text: Living is tough, right? Your mind is always clogged with unpleasant thoughts. Your chest is always bursting with unwanted shame. I get it, because I was the same. So, let me help you replace all that suffering with mindless pain.

evo.flavour_text: You know it too, right? You'll only break under your self-reproach. You'll only drown in your self-doubt. I get it, because I was the same. Now, let me help suffocate you in endless, everlasting pain.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Give all enemy followers on the field -0/-2.
Ambush Once on each of your turns, when an enemy follower is given - defense on the field, restore 1 defense to your leader.
Super-Evolve: Give your opponent Crest: Krulle, Heir to Unkilling.

common.flavour_text: I'm made up of sugar and fruit and everything cute. If my sister-boo sees me when I'm not looking my super cutest, I just might cry!

At the end of your turn, evolve this follower.

common.name: Glade, Fragrantwood Ward
common.flavour_text: They would defeat the Mad God. There was no question of that. But afterwards? How were they to raise an infant world? There, the young wards were as fractured as the future they reflected. —Tale of Eight Masks, Chapter 4
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Draw 2 cards.
Evolve: Deal X damage split between all enemy followers. X is the number of cards in your hand.

questions.question: What does "deal X damage split between all enemy followers" mean?
questions.answer:
Damage split between enemies is dealt in order from oldest enemy follower on the field to newest (right to left), with each follower taking up to its defense in damage before the subsequent follower takes damage.

For example, if there are 3 enemy followers on the field with defense values of 3, 3, and 2 from right to left, and X is 7, then they will take 3, 3, and 1 damage, respectively.

common.flavour_text: Everyone laughed. What kind of dwarf gets scared of fire? They chased him out of the rocky forges, and he fled to the flameless comfort of the forests. With his great strength, he rescued the woodland creatures by lifting a fallen tree.

common.name: Ignominious Samurai

questions.question: If I play a Gildaria, Anathema of Peace when my Rally is 19, will Gildaria's Fanfare ability activate?
questions.answer: No. Unlike Combo, Rally only increases after an allied follower enters the field, which means your Rally would be 19 when Gildaria's Fanfare ability is triggered.

questions.question: There are 3 enemy copies of Fairy on the field, and there's only an Oluon, Raging Chariot on my field. If I evolve it and end my turn, is the likelihood that its ability targets the enemy leader affected by the number of enemy followers on the field?
questions.answer: Yes. Each activation of "Deal 7 damage to another random ally or enemy" selects from the available targets with equal probability, and since there are 5 available targets initially, there will be a 20% chance of selecting each. If a Fairy is selected and destroyed, the following activation will have a 25% chance of selecting the enemy leader, and so on until all 3 activations have been resolved.

questions.question: I have 2 copies of Clay Golem on the field, and the only followers in my deck are an Indomitable Fighter and a Quake Goliath. If I play Grandeur of the Dawnblossom, are my 2 copies of Clay Golem guaranteed to transform into an Indomitable Fighter and a Quake Goliath?
questions.answer: No. Each copy has a 50/50 chance to transform into either an Indomitable Fighter or a Quake Goliath.

common.name: William, Mysterian Student
common.flavour_text: Curious about our student body, are you? Well, Mysteria believes diversity leads to innovation, which means many of our pupils are rather... unique. It's actually quite rare to find an absolutely normal, 100-percent-mundane student like me.
common.skill_text:
X starts at 0. On Spellboost: Increase X by 1.
Fanfare: Deal X damage to all enemy followers.
Evolve: Spellboost your hand 2 times.

evo.flavour_text:
Oi, numbskull! Whaddaya think yer doin', runnin' through the hall like a—
Argh! I slipped up again! Why is it so hard to sound like normal, respectable folk?!
evo.skill_text:
X starts at 0. On Spellboost: Increase X by 1.
Fanfare: Deal X damage to all enemy followers.
Evolve: Spellboost your hand 2 times.

common.name: Norman, Adamant Alchemist
common.flavour_text:
Alchemy, at its core, boils down to how many unique objects you can fuse together. Or, you could just fuse elementals, and let the amalgam do the rest.
"All creation is in our hands. Go, Adamantia!"
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Earth Rite (1) - Select a Mode to activate. 1. Summon a Guardian Golem and give it Barrier. 2. Draw 3 cards. 3. Restore 4 defense to your leader.
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.

questions.question: When the effects of a Fanfare ability involving Mode selection are replicated, do I get to select a Mode again?

evo.flavour_text: Perhaps students too can be alchemized, so to speak. Mysteria is full of quirky individuals who come together as a student body to accomplish greater learning. Naturally, the alchemy professor is happy to catalyze their transformation from novices to masters.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Earth Rite (1) - Select a Mode to activate. 1. Summon a Guardian Golem and give it Barrier. 2. Draw 3 cards. 3. Restore 4 defense to your leader.
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.

common.name: Ezecrain, Portent of Vengeance
common.flavour_text: I will scour every corner of the skies. I will find the one who brought ruin to our homeland, who stole the Crystal of Beginnings. I will not rest...
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Select 2 enemy followers on the field and deal them 4 damage. Gain 2 earth sigils.

evo.flavour_text: Vengeance is not yet mine. Not until I deal with this so-called Foe. I'll give them no chance to repent, even if I have to chase them to the ends of the skies... To this I vow!
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Select 2 enemy followers on the field and deal them 4 damage. Gain 2 earth sigils.

common.name: Waterbending Charmwielder
common.flavour_text: In the past, games made up the fabric of society. Creation was the child of joy. But you have forgotten. You wretched, pitiful souls. —Games with Dawnblossom, No. 2
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to 3 random enemy followers. Spellboost your hand 3 times.

evo.flavour_text: Without games, humanity will lose joy. And without joy, you lose your raison d'etre. But take heart. Where you showed me cruelty, I shall show you mercy. I shall take away your humanity and return your future. —Games with Dawnblossom, No. 3
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to 3 random enemy followers. Spellboost your hand 3 times.

common.name: Woodsong Haikumaster
common.flavour_text: The Flower Kami believe games are a form of invention. Your love of puppets led to technology. Your fascination with firecrackers and fireworks led to warfare. —Games with Dawnblossom, No. 4
common.skill_text:
On Spellboost: Reduce the cost of this card by 1.
Fanfare: Draw a card.
Last Words: Spellboost your hand.

evo.flavour_text: Games are the fertile grounds of discovery. Philosophy, art, technology, and law may all trace their roots back to games. How could humanity have forgotten such a vital truth? —Games with Dawnblossom, No. 5
evo.skill_text:
On Spellboost: Reduce the cost of this card by 1.
Fanfare: Draw a card.
Last Words: Spellboost your hand.

style_card_list.flavour_text: The Flower Kami believe games are a form of invention. Your love of puppets led to technology. Your fascination with firecrackers and fireworks led to warfare. —Games with Dawnblossom, No. 4

common.name: Kuon, Fivefold Master
common.flavour_text: At the supposed end of the Trials, an uninvited guest appears. With the power of rejection, the intruder sends me flying to an unfamiliar stage—a stage of revelry. A world without the five elements I command... How peculiar.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon a Celestial Shikigami, Demonic Shikigami, and Paper Shikigami. Enhance (10): Destroy all allied Shikigami followers. Summon a Noble Shikigami.
Super-Evolve: Select an allied Shikigami follower on the field and give it Storm.

evo.flavour_text:
(Can weaklings even be taught?)
(The talentless should be kicked aside.)
(Unfortunately for you, playtime's over.)
Secrets and wrath mix with decisive action.
(Cry some more, whelps.)
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon a Celestial Shikigami, Demonic Shikigami, and Paper Shikigami. Enhance (10): Destroy all allied Shikigami followers. Summon a Noble Shikigami.
Super-Evolve: Select an allied Shikigami follower on the field and give it Storm.

common.name: Celestial Shikigami
common.flavour_text: When Onmyodo masters fold with fingertips that burn with god-power, this being is what appears. The white miracle, the celestial shikigami. Before it, all who have not touched the face of divinity are as insubstantial as paper in the wind.
common.skill_text: Ward Last Words: Spellboost your hand 3 times.

evo.flavour_text:
(What do you mean, "What is that?" It says "shikigami," you imbecile. Learn to read.)
(What are those supposed to be? Doodles?)
(Let me show you the real deal...)
evo.skill_text: Ward Last Words: Spellboost your hand 3 times.

common.name: Demonic Shikigami
common.flavour_text: This fearsome feat of divination knows no law but the word of its onmyoji. Blades do naught but anger it; shields cannot save you from its onslaught. Your sole consolation is that few could ever summon it.
common.skill_text: Rush Last Words: Spellboost your hand.

evo.flavour_text: A shikigami is moved by power primordial and divine. Though many onmyoji first study familiar shapes, as they grow, they learn to create the unimaginable—supernatural terrors beyond mortal form.
evo.skill_text: Rush Last Words: Spellboost your hand.

common.name: Noble Shikigami
common.flavour_text: Most shikigami are small facsimiles—approximations of divinity. This, however, is elemental mastery. Subjugation of the zodiac. A god of calamity sworn to its maker. But what mortal could possibly create an entity such as this?
common.skill_text:
When this follower enters the field, give it +X/+Y. X/Y is the total base attack/defense of allied Shikigami followers destroyed this turn.
Ward Aura

evo.flavour_text: (Tch. Look at these idiots, excited over enchanted scrap paper. I'd try to pound some sense into their skulls, but with this shikigami, I'd be putting them in their graves before putting them in their places.)
evo.skill_text:
When this follower enters the field, give it +X/+Y. X/Y is the total base attack/defense of allied Shikigami followers destroyed this turn.
Ward Aura

common.name: Emperor of Elements
common.flavour_text: Your indifference has doomed you. In time, humanity will use and abandon everything—then who will pull the green turf over your cold, dead body? You should be glad to shed your monstrous skin. —Games with Dawnblossom, No. 13
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon 2 copies of Guardian Golem.
Whenever an allied Golem follower enters the field, Earth Rite (1) - Evolve it.

evo.flavour_text: None can know your future. When we reach that distant shore beyond the seven seas, we will be ■■■. Let the journey commence, pactbearer. —Games with Dawnblossom, No. 14: Lessons from the Fool
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon 2 copies of Guardian Golem.
Whenever an allied Golem follower enters the field, Earth Rite (1) - Evolve it.

common.name: Demonic Call
common.flavour_text: The Onmyodo master stood tall, snarling down at his opponent like a predator savoring the hunt. The otherworldly beasts flitted about as they awaited their master's order to deal the final blow.
common.skill_text:
On Spellboost: Reduce the cost of this card by 1.
Summon a Demonic Shikigami.

common.name: Rune Portal
common.flavour_text: You've come at the perfect time! I actually have a new potion I want to try on you right away! Now now, no need to be frightened. It is simply a beauty potion that I developed just for you!
common.skill_text: Deal 6 damage to all enemy followers. Restore 3 defense to your leader.

common.name: Lilanthim, Anathema of Edacity
common.flavour_text: My first assignment better be good! I didn't become an Anathema just to sit around twiddling my thumbs! First, it better involve taking stuff! And obviously, I'll be keeping everything. And then... I want a big dinner!
common.skill_text:
Aura Last Words: Earth Rite (2) - Summon a Lilanthim, Anathema of Edacity.
Super-Evolve: Select 2 enemy followers on the field and destroy them.

evo.flavour_text: A self-proclaimed Anathema, Lilanthim controls "edax," a suspected fifth element. Though designated as a special target from another world, she currently operates as an Anathema. While willing to accept most assignments, she remains a wild card. Approach with caution.
evo.skill_text:
Aura Last Words: Earth Rite (2) - Summon a Lilanthim, Anathema of Edacity.
Super-Evolve: Select 2 enemy followers on the field and destroy them.

common.name: Snowman Army
common.flavour_text: As our mistress molded our forms in her hands, we felt ourselves come to life. Her warmth... Her kindness... They made us who we are today, and we shall never forget that. Our bodies may be ice-cold, but not our hearts.
common.skill_text:
On Spellboost: Reduce the cost of this card by 1.
Select an enemy follower on the field, set its defense to 1, and, until the end of your opponent's turn, give it "Can't attack followers or leaders."

questions.question: If I evolve a Quake Goliath whose attack/defense have been set to 4/1 by Snowman Army, how much attack/defense will it have? What about if I super-evolve it?
questions.answer: Its attack/defense will be 6/3 if you evolve it, and 7/4 if you super-evolve it.

common.name: Raio, Elimination Manifest
common.flavour_text: Leather conceals and cloth disguises. Likewise, words obfuscate. A single lie begets endless delusion. So decorate thy depths with deceit, until thou knowest not truth from deception. And then... the trial of the world shall continue.
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Reduce the cost of all followers in your deck by 3. Transform a random spell in your hand into an Ersatz Elimination. It costs 0 until the end of the turn.

evo.flavour_text: All one sees on the surface is fabricated. Thy will, thy hope, are but shallow decorations. Ye who seek veritas, heed my word; only at the revelation of all falsehoods shall you find truth. And then... the trial of the world shall continue.
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Reduce the cost of all followers in your deck by 3. Transform a random spell in your hand into an Ersatz Elimination. It costs 0 until the end of the turn.

common.name: Ersatz Elimination
common.flavour_text: Truth—all that is revealed after wants and wishes fade away. Elimination—all that is left when bluster and concealment are spent. In this, they are alike: you must defy them or be unraveled.
common.skill_text: Increase the cost of all followers in your hand by 1. Destroy all enemy followers.

common.name: Blaze Destroyer
common.flavour_text:
My order to the beast will be simple: Burn it all.
Surely I will be the first to burn, but what of it? Such concerns will only impede progress.
—Remains of a singed research log
common.skill_text: On Spellboost: Reduce the cost of this card by 1.

evo.flavour_text:
A dragon requires the life force needed to survive through the ages.
A demon requires the infernal energy to plunge the world into darkness.
This creature possesses great power, but no purpose.
evo.skill_text: On Spellboost: Reduce the cost of this card by 1.

common.name: Ara, Dawnblossom
common.flavour_text: Allow me to formally introduce myself. I am Ara of the Flower Kami, also known as the Dawnblossom. I believe games can be a force for change. Come, you pitiful soul—let us effect your transformation. —Games with Dawnblossom, No. 6
common.skill_text:
On Spellboost: Reduce the cost of this card by 1.
Fanfare: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 10 damage.
Evolve: Select another follower on the field and transform it into a Regal Falcon.

evo.flavour_text: To go stagnant is to die. However, though your kind left us to rot among the dust and cobwebs, I would never do the same to you. One cannot blame the strangling ivy for its cruelty. One cannot blame humanity for its indifference. —Games with Dawnblossom, No. 7
evo.skill_text:
On Spellboost: Reduce the cost of this card by 1.
Fanfare: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 10 damage.
Evolve: Select another follower on the field and transform it into a Regal Falcon.

common.name: Regal Falcon
common.flavour_text: Angels may turn their blades on their creators, as they are possessive of free will. A messenger without a will can only flap its wings. Pure and naive of temperament, they work only for the heavens.
common.skill_text: Storm

evo.flavour_text: Angels oft endure harsh rebuke from their creators. They grow resentful, and forsake the holy teachings. The heavens came to need messengers of a more naive temperament.
evo.skill_text: Storm

common.name: Dimension Climb
common.flavour_text:
The infinite expanses of time and space are but idle amusements to her.
"This dimension's so dull. On to the next!"
common.skill_text:
On Spellboost: Reduce the cost of this card by 1.
Return your hand to deck. Draw 5 cards. Spellboost your hand 5 times. Fully recover your play points.

questions.question: I use Dimension Climb to return a Blaze Destroyer whose cost has been reduced to 6 by its On Spellboost ability from my hand to my deck. If I then redraw it while resolving the "draw 5 cards" part of Dimension Climb's ability, what will its cost be?
questions.answer: Its cost will be 6 when you redraw it, since cards returned from hand to deck retain effects applied to them. It will then be spellboosted a total of 6 times—once from your having played a spell and 5 times from the "spellboost your hand 5 times" part of Dimension Climb's ability—reducing its cost to 0.

questions.question: I use Dimension Climb to return a Stormy Blast whose X value has been increased to 4 by its On Spellboost ability from my hand to my deck. If I then redraw it while resolving the "draw 5 cards" part of Dimension Climb's ability, what will its X value be?
questions.answer: Its X value will be 4 when you redraw it, since cards returned from hand to deck retain effects applied to them. It will then be spellboosted a total of 6 times—once from your having played a spell and 5 times from the "spellboost your hand 5 times" part of Dimension Climb's ability—increasing its X value to 10.

questions.question: I have 9 max play points. I use my bonus play point, then play Kuon, Fivefold Master with Enhance (10), leaving me with 0 play points. If I play a 0-cost Dimension Climb, how many play points will I recover?

common.name: Soaring Ivory Dragon
common.flavour_text: The young ivory dragon leapt aloft and soared higher and higher. It let out a roar of triumph, for it had finally outflown its parents.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: If you're in Overflow, draw a card.
Rush

evo.flavour_text:
Y'know, us an' dragons ain't so different. The first time you surpass your inspirations, you think you're hot stuff. But sooner or later, that little guy's gonna learn that just flyin' high isn't gonna get people lookin' up at him. That takes work.
—Dragonfolk Neighbor
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: If you're in Overflow, draw a card.
Rush

common.name: Strike of the Dragonewt
common.flavour_text:
Humankind is industrious because it is weak. Generations upon generations have worked to hone woodwork, stonework, ironwork, and steelwork.
But what is a fire-forged blade when faced with fire made flesh?
common.skill_text: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 2 damage. If you're in Overflow, deal 4 damage instead.

common.name: Ferocious Flame
common.flavour_text:
So, the Trial of Disdain has been overcome. Now the Trial of Ardor is at hand. The fifth Omen wields the power of ardent disdain.
The Omens persist. The trials continue.
common.skill_text: Select an allied follower on the field and deal it 1 damage. Deal 3 damage to a random enemy follower. If you're in Overflow, draw a Dragoncraft follower.

common.name: Fan of Otohime
common.flavour_text:
"The ocean currents are growing erratic. We must pacify its anger, and quickly!"
"I know, but how do you appease a fan?!"
"Why, Princess?! Why'd you have to drop it?!"
―Otohime's Royal Guard
common.skill_text: Engage (3): Summon an Otohime's Bodyguard. Select a card in your hand and discard it.

questions.question: Can I engage Fan of Otohime even if my hand is empty?
questions.answer: Yes. Doing so will summon an Otohime's Bodyguard without discarding a card.

common.name: Otohime's Bodyguard
common.flavour_text: Don't be fooled by their small statures—Otohime's loyal guards are among the sea's greatest.
common.skill_text: Storm Ward

evo.flavour_text: I've been serving Otohime since I was thiiis tall, but look at me now! I feel like I've really grown both as a guard and a perso—huh? W-wait! I swear I won't grow taller than her, so don't kick me ouuut!
evo.skill_text: Storm Ward

common.name: Pyrewyrm Blade
common.flavour_text:
To man, fire is a neighbor. With it, he lights his hearth, he cooks, he watches it burn—for that is all he can do. But to dragons, fire is a subordinate. Should a dragon demand it, fire would even change its shape.
—Son of the Pyrewyrm, Wielder of the Blade
common.skill_text: Engage (1): Destroy this card. Select an allied follower on the field and give it +1/+1 and "Last Words: Summon a Pyrewyrm Blade."

common.name: Searing Firenewt
common.flavour_text: These lizards shed scales as an act of rebirth; they spit fire as an act of butchery. Life and death, contained right in their biology. Thus, there is no environment they shun, no threat they fear. —World Encyclopedia of Beasts, Salamanders
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 1 damage.

evo.flavour_text: When a firenewt's tail regrows, it does so without any skeletal structure. This absence is actually a boon, for it allows the lizard's tail flame to bloom all the brighter. —World Encyclopedia of Beasts, Salamanders
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 1 damage.

common.name: Little Dragon Nanny
common.flavour_text:
"I don't want an arranged marriage! Just leave me alone!" Tearing away from the mansion, the girl nearly tramples a lost baby dragon.
"Are you asking to come along? Okay. Bet you have better taste in princes than my whole family combined."
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon a Fire Drake Whelp.
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.

evo.flavour_text: Mornings caked in baby food. Afternoons putting out fires. Nights soothing away squalls. As the young girl burps a baby dragon, she ponders the irony of life. She ran away from home because she wasn't ready to be a bride. Now, she is somehow a mother.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon a Fire Drake Whelp.
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.

common.name: Fire Drake Whelp
common.flavour_text:
Had an unexpected find today. Came across a hatchling. While baby dragons are known to fly straight from the shell, this one made no attempt to flap its wings.
—Field notes on an active volcano, 1
common.skill_text: Intimidate

evo.flavour_text:
This species abandons their eggs in volcanic craters, where they are incubated by heat from the lava. Like any child, the hatchling imprints upon this environment and loves it as a mother.
—Field notes on an active volcano, 2
evo.skill_text: Intimidate

common.name: Intent Dragonewt Princess
common.flavour_text: I finally reclaimed the land of my people, and avenged their sorrows. So now... I want to grant their wish of prosperity. Which means I've gotta hunt down someone worthy of my bloodline!
common.skill_text: Fanfare: If there's a super-evolved allied follower on the field, draw 2 cards.

evo.flavour_text: What do dragonewts prize in potential partners, you may wonder. It's not social status, or alchemical brilliance—no. You could be crowned or a criminal; she would care not. There's only one way to impress her, and that's to best her in a duel.
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: If there's a super-evolved allied follower on the field, draw 2 cards.

common.name: Filene, Whitefrost Bloom
common.flavour_text: A flower turns her face toward a sky she can never touch. To wrench her roots from the cold porcelain would break them. She is frozen in place by her family and duty, until the fire of death finds her, and she melts.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: If you're in Overflow, add a Whitefrost Whisper to your hand.
Bane
Evolve: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.

evo.flavour_text: Steel clashing against steel, frost against flame, the white canvas of the tundra pulsing blue, then red, like a huge, throbbing wound of light. Both warriors buoyed by conviction, neither willing to give way... ―Blackwing and Whitefrost
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: If you're in Overflow, add a Whitefrost Whisper to your hand.
Bane
Evolve: Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.

common.name: Whitefrost Whisper
common.flavour_text: The Whitefrost Guardian speaks first. "Prove your strength." The Blackwing Conqueror grins. "Famous last words." ―Blackwing and Whitefrost
common.skill_text: Select a Mode to activate. 1. Destroy all damaged enemy followers. 2. Increase the cost of all cards in your opponent's hand by 1 until the end of their turn.

questions.question: I use Ruby, Greedy Cherub's Fanfare ability to return a Quake Goliath whose cost has been increased to 5 by Whitefrost Whisper to my deck. If I then redraw it in the same turn, what will its cost be?
questions.answer: Its cost will be 5, since cards returned from hand to deck retain effects applied to them. The effect on Quake Goliath will then expire at the end of your turn, reverting its cost to 4.

questions.question: I use Ruby, Greedy Cherub's Fanfare ability to return a Quake Goliath whose cost has been increased to 5 by Whitefrost Whisper to my deck. If I then redraw it in my next turn, what will its cost be?
questions.answer: Its cost will be 4. Cards returned from hand to deck retain effects applied to them, but the effect on Quake Goliath will have expired at the end of your previous turn, reverting its cost to 4.

common.name: Devotee of Disdain
common.flavour_text: "You're in pain. Please, let me ease your suffering." His talons pierced the girl's skin, but she simply smiled as her toxic blood began to corrode his claws. "I see now. Pain gives you strength. I leave unkilling in your hands, Krulle."
common.skill_text: During your turn, whenever this follower takes damage but isn't destroyed, draw a Dragoncraft follower.

questions.question: If I attack an unevolved enemy Leah, Bellringer Angel with Devotee of Disdain, will "During your turn, whenever this follower takes damage but isn't destroyed, draw a Dragoncraft follower" activate?
If I attack an enemy Quake Goliath with a super-evolved Devotee of Disdain, will "During your turn, whenever this follower takes damage but isn't destroyed, draw a Dragoncraft follower" activate?

evo.flavour_text: "You must not cede your land to me so easily." With his ring, the young man summoned a spear. He knew that the ring demanded a toll: whatever object he prized most. But he did it anyway. "Well fought, Sinciro. Will you inherit usurpation?"
evo.skill_text: During your turn, whenever this follower takes damage but isn't destroyed, draw a Dragoncraft follower.

common.name: Mari, Meg's Bestie
common.flavour_text: Psh, you hitting on me? You men only want one thing, and it's disgusting. Shallow boys like you peace out when it counts, and I don't have time for—oh! There's Meg!
common.skill_text:
Activates in hand. Whenever a 3-base-cost allied follower super-evolves, set the cost of this card to 0 until the end of the turn.
<hr>At the end of your turn, give a random super-evolved allied follower on the field +1/+1.

evo.flavour_text: Meg, you're back! Feelin' okay? Shoulders stiff? Feet hurt? Whatever you need, Nurse Mari is here to—huh? Do I have time? 'Course I do! I've got so much time I don't know what to do with myself! I'm all yours!
evo.skill_text:
Activates in hand. Whenever a 3-base-cost allied follower super-evolves, set the cost of this card to 0 until the end of the turn.
<hr>At the end of your turn, give a random super-evolved allied follower on the field +1/+1.

common.name: Springwell Steward
common.flavour_text: Would you like to follow me into the world of dreams, player? Yawn... Hurry up with that answer, or I'll fall asleep first. —Games with Crestpetal, No. 8
common.skill_text: Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 5 damage. Super-Evolve: Select 2 instead.

evo.flavour_text: Indolence must not be treasured more than life. May just punishment be administered to correct this imbalance. —Games with Crestpetal, No. 9: Lessons from Justice
evo.skill_text: Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 5 damage. Super-Evolve: Select 2 instead.

common.name: Jellyfish Dancer
common.flavour_text: To the Flower Kami, games and dreams go hand in hand. You'll see what I mean. By the time we're done playing, all you can think about will be fun. —Games with Crestpetal, No. 4
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Add a Majestic Megalorca to your hand.
Whenever an allied Marine follower enters the field, give this follower Rush and Bane.

evo.flavour_text: There's no need to be nervous. You'll be able to see that delightful dream soon enough. And once you do, I daresay you'll never want to see reality again. —Games with Crestpetal, No. 5
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Add a Majestic Megalorca to your hand.
Whenever an allied Marine follower enters the field, give this follower Rush and Bane.

common.name: Majestic Megalorca
common.flavour_text: Megalorcas have fortified their bodies in service of greater beings. Their unsparing lives underwater have developed their flexibility and hardened their teeth, allowing them to grow into highly resilient sea beasts. —Sea Beasts and Their Tales, Chapter 3
common.skill_text: Rush

common.skill_text: Do this 2 times: "Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower." If you're in Overflow, deal 2 damage to the enemy leader.

common.name: Eyfa, Windrider

I need someone to share it with. Just to make this alien expanse feel a bit more like home.

Fanfare: If you're in Overflow, give this follower Intimidate.

Fanfare: If you're in Overflow, give this follower Intimidate.

evo.flavour_text:

But I've lost my wings. I can read the wind, but I can no longer ride it. I'm stranded here until a miracle comes along.

When this follower evolves, gain 1 max play point.

Whenever a 2-base-cost allied follower enters the field, give this follower Ward.

evo.flavour_text: I've had rotten luck on five straight summer trips to Auguste, but thanks to those trials, I'm finally tough enough to survive my ideal vacation. Ursula, give me a hand—we're gonna protect Auguste, together!

Whenever a 2-base-cost allied follower enters the field, give this follower Ward.

common.name: Yube, Crestpetal

From the smoke of war, a flash of light,

common.name: Goldennote Melody
common.flavour_text: She is the sound of wealth, of thunder, and of music. To thousands of worshippers, her song heralds prosperity.

common.skill_text: Deal 5 damage to all followers with the highest defense. If you're in Overflow, deal 3 damage to all leaders with the highest defense.

questions.question: What does "all followers with the highest defense" mean?
questions.answer:
Raging Lightning finds the highest defense value among all followers on the field, then deals damage to all followers with that much defense.

For example, if the field consists of a 10/5 Caravan Mammoth, 4/5 Quake Goliath, and 2/2 Indomitable Fighter, Raging Lightning would deal 5 damage to both the Caravan Mammoth and Quake Goliath.

A single insect stands no chance against a man. A swarm, however, can topple civilizations.
What horizons, then, might an army of dragons conquer? Perhaps only the gods can say.

evo.skill_text: Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 4 damage. Super-Evolve: Deal damage to all enemy followers instead.

Plagues and natural disasters are dangerous, but they bear no malice because they lack sentience. Beware bloodlust, for it is death given purpose.

common.name: Burnite, Anathema of Flame

The low flame roils, irritated and indignant at the boredom that plagues it. What is a fire to do with nothing to burn?

questions.answer: No, you can't have more than one of the same crest.

evo.flavour_text: An Anathema known as the Scorched Dragon, Burnite's curses carbonize her targets. However, she too suffers from her power. Childish, fickle, and often impulsive, many are warned against giving her important assignments.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Select a card in your hand and discard it. Deal X damage to all enemy followers. X is the cost of the selected card.
Super-Evolve: Give your opponent Crest: Burnite, Anathema of Flame.

common.name: Neptune, Arbiter of Tides

Mother Ocean is accepting of all—but the lifeforms that inhabit her do not share her tolerance. Warily they watch, ready to unleash the deep's rage at would-be invaders. 
"Tides whirl and waves crash forth. Bring calm to our ocean paradise."

Fanfare: Gain Crest: Neptune, Arbiter of Tides. Summon 2 copies of Majestic Megalorca.

evo.flavour_text: Mortals have overcome their inborn weakness, crossing the world all by themselves. They even tamed the flames of my element for their cooking! Now I'm inspired to try creating something that nourishes the soul!
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 8 damage.
Intimidate
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.

common.name: Ruinbringer
common.flavour_text: I'm getting sleepy... Mind if we end this before my bedtime? Then we can meet in our dreams. —Games with Crestpetal, No. 13
common.skill_text: Super-Evolve: Banish all 1-, 3-, 5-, 7-, and 9-cost cards from your deck. Deal X damage split between all enemy followers. X is the number of cards you banished.

evo.flavour_text: Beware the thorns of the unending dream. My friend, you must be the one to end this abominable nightmare. —Games with Crestpetal, No. 14: Lessons from Justice
evo.skill_text: Super-Evolve: Banish all 1-, 3-, 5-, 7-, and 9-cost cards from your deck. Deal X damage split between all enemy followers. X is the number of cards you banished.

common.name: Warrior of the Deep
common.flavour_text:
Finned, fanged, and fierce, sharkfolk are a dangerous species. They conform to a strict hierarchy, likely to keep the seas from running red.
When approaching one of their kind, be as the remora—docile and deferential.
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Deal 6 damage to the enemy leader.

evo.flavour_text:
Sharkfolk? They're the sole reason my business is all afloat. Guardians of the sea they are, keepin' all manner of creatures from running amok. So they're sticklers for status... We've all got our hang-ups.
—Local fisherman
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Deal 6 damage to the enemy leader.

common.name: Silvercloud Dragonrider
common.flavour_text:
Dragons are swift, powerful, and lethal—fearsome forces of nature. But perhaps even more intimidating are the mortal soldiers who choose to ride upon their backs.
"Our foe has retreated from the sky. Let us return home."
common.skill_text: Ward Last Words: Summon a Vastwing Dragon.

evo.flavour_text: Dragonriders rarely chase down fleeing enemies, because a single life means nothing to them. They fight on the plane of concepts—for freedom or peace or country. They know to save their strength, because the war they fight has no end.
evo.skill_text: Ward Last Words: Summon a Vastwing Dragon.

common.name: Garyu, Fabled Dragonkin
common.flavour_text:
In the blink of an eye, the triumphant dragons find themselves in a foreign land. The glorious contest they had joined is nowhere to be found. Faced with uncertainty, the heroic dragonkin laughs with his shimmering companions.
"No matter! I'm quite used to wandering!"
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon a Supreme Golden Dragon and Supreme Silver Dragon.
Super-Evolve: Give all allied copies of Supreme Golden Dragon on the field Storm. Give all allied copies of Supreme Silver Dragon on the field Barrier.

evo.flavour_text:
In a wasteland of wastrels and brigands, a strange man appears. Initially looked on with suspicion, he manages to find his place among them. A true, gallant hero, his spirit soars toward the sky like a glorious phoenix.
"Now, what world shall I conquer next?"
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon a Supreme Golden Dragon and Supreme Silver Dragon.
Super-Evolve: Give all allied copies of Supreme Golden Dragon on the field Storm. Give all allied copies of Supreme Silver Dragon on the field Barrier.

common.name: Supreme Golden Dragon
common.flavour_text: The golden gleam within the storms is that of unmatched fangs. It is a breathing embodiment of violence, a true dragon―untainted by mortal blood. Worshipped and feared, it resides on a mountain peak above the clouds.
common.skill_text: Ward

evo.flavour_text: Honoring its vow, the golden gleam sets off on a journey with its sworn brothers. Though it ends up in a strange land, its purpose remains the same. Every day is an adventure as it shapes this new world to its image.
evo.skill_text: Ward

common.name: Supreme Silver Dragon
common.flavour_text: The silver sheen within the storms is that of peerless claws. It is a roaring incarnation of hubris, a true dragon―untainted by mortal blood. Feared and worshipped, it rules a mountain peak above the clouds.
common.skill_text: Rush

evo.flavour_text: Honoring its vow, the silver sheen sets off on a journey with its sworn brothers. Though it once spent its days in mindless boredom, its fortune has since changed for the better. Every day is fulfilling as it shapes this chaotic world to its image.
evo.skill_text: Rush

common.name: Fennie, Prismatic Phoenix
common.flavour_text: As the demon hordes approached, a prismatic deity appeared. Framed by wings sublime and flames supreme, she could be none other than the glorious phoenix. With cleansing fire, she wiped out the encroaching miasma, exorcising the demons and delivering peace unto the land.
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Halve the cost of all cards in your deck.

questions.question: If a card with an odd-numbered cost has its cost halved by Fennie, Prismatic Phoenix's Fanfare ability, what happens?
questions.answer: The result will be rounded up. For example, a 9-cost card will become a 5-cost card.

questions.question: If I play 2 copies of Fennie, Prismatic Phoenix in a row, what will happen to the costs of cards in my deck?
questions.answer: They will be halved, and then halved again.

evo.flavour_text: And that was an excerpt from The Legend of the Glorious Phoenix! Isn't it just perfect? Whoever wrote this masterpiece deserves a pat on the... What? I got the title wrong? It's Legend of the Littlest Phoenix?! All right, I'm changing my pat to a smack!
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Halve the cost of all cards in your deck.

common.name: Mugen, Steel-Bodied Honesty
common.flavour_text: Stardust Town nice. Mugen like here. Yummy, warm, kind place. Everyone friends... Fun together! Nehan live together with Mugen! Mugen happy!
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Super Skybound Art - Give this follower Storm.
Super-Evolve: Select 2 enemy followers on the field and destroy them.

evo.flavour_text: Mugen use power to protect everyone. For instance, protect Nehan, Tien, Feower, Stardust children, Captain, crew... Mugen protect all.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Super Skybound Art - Give this follower Storm.
Super-Evolve: Select 2 enemy followers on the field and destroy them.

common.name: Ironmace Dragoon
common.flavour_text: Did you and your friends come all this way to take me down? Not that I mind. Who cares who wins or loses? Games are like dreams—an escape from our boring realities. —Games with Crestpetal, No. 10
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 7 damage. Summon a Vastwing Dragon.

evo.flavour_text: To not seek justice is blatant dereliction of duty. That sin will prove to be their downfall. —Games with Crestpetal, No. 11: Lessons from Justice
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 7 damage. Summon a Vastwing Dragon.

common.name: Twilight Dragon
common.flavour_text:
It is human instinct to capture great and terrible beasts in literature. Some seek to extol, others to shock, most to warn. Yet from our books and our golden scrolls, the ebony dragon is missing.
―A lost inscription
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Give all enemy followers on the field -0/-9.
Super-Evolve: Draw 3 cards.

evo.flavour_text:
It lies outside the bounds of language and the pales of reason. It comes without portent―a shroud of darkness plunging from the heavens. The hour of twilight has passed; the sun of mortals has set.
―A lost inscription
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Give all enemy followers on the field -0/-9.
Super-Evolve: Draw 3 cards.

common.name: Azurifrit, Heir to Disdain
common.flavour_text: The world was pitifully frail. Any life he touched would crumble away. Thus the black dragon took it upon himself to personally administer the trials. His heart aches with each life he takes, but he will deliver salvation till all the weak are dust.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Do this 3 times: "Deal 2 damage to all followers."
Ward During your turn, whenever this follower takes damage but isn't destroyed, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Super-Evolve: Fully restore the defense of this follower. Do this 3 times: "Deal 2 damage to all followers."

questions.question: If I attack an unevolved enemy Leah, Bellringer Angel with Azurifrit, Heir to Disdain, will "During your turn, whenever this follower takes damage but isn't destroyed, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader" activate?

If I attack an enemy Servant of Cocytus with a super-evolved Azurifrit, Heir to Disdain, will "During your turn, whenever this follower takes damage but isn't destroyed, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader" activate?

I have Crest: Krulle, Heir to Unkilling. If I play Azurifrit, Heir to Disdain, will "During your turn, whenever this follower takes damage but isn't destroyed, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader" activate?
questions.answer: No. After Azurifrit's Fanfare ability brings itself down to 1 defense, Crest: Krulle, Heir to Unkilling's ability will bring it down to 0, destroying it.

evo.flavour_text: "The gods will save the world. But who will save the gods? It's not enough to receive—we must gift the gods their own trials. I know I can't do it alone—but if I choose my allies well, we might succeed. Let's be strong, until the day we can repay the gods for their many blessings."
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Do this 3 times: "Deal 2 damage to all followers."
Ward During your turn, whenever this follower takes damage but isn't destroyed, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Super-Evolve: Fully restore the defense of this follower. Do this 3 times: "Deal 2 damage to all followers."

common.name: Genesis Dragon Reborn
common.flavour_text: In the beginning, the gods made heaven and earth. But from whence came the gods? From the mother of all life, the sea. Hence, in the beginning, before the gods, before heaven and earth, there was the sea.
common.skill_text: Storm

evo.flavour_text:
And the gods receiveth Word:
A Great Flood will rise to cover both Heaven and Earth. None that is Living nor Divine shall escape it. All that shall remain of thy Glory is a single Ark cast adrift on the Waves...
evo.skill_text: Storm

common.name: Wise Guardian Dragon
common.flavour_text: Dragons in all their years are wise beyond mortal comprehension. They know all the human tongues, remember history immemorial, and wield magic unbelievable. But one question confounds even the sagest dragon: how to keep aspiring boyfriends away from his darling daughter.
common.skill_text:
Activates in hand. Whenever an allied follower super-evolves, reduce the cost of this card by 3.
Fanfare: Summon a Vastwing Dragon.

questions.question: I have a 10-cost Wise Guardian Dragon in my hand. If I super-evolve Olivia, Heroic Dark Angel using SEP and Arriet, Luxminstrel with Olivia's Super-Evolve ability, what will the Wise Guardian Dragon's cost be?

evo.flavour_text: Oh, my! You came all the way from the village to see me? Thank you so much! You see, I've never had any boy friends to play with, so this is actually the first time I've had a boy ove—oh? Fa-father, you startled me. Do you want to play too?
evo.skill_text:
Activates in hand. Whenever an allied follower super-evolves, reduce the cost of this card by 3.
Fanfare: Summon a Vastwing Dragon.

common.name: Erntz, Governing Justice
common.flavour_text:
I am Justice, warden of equality.
All who have been robbed of their fair share,
all who are victims of disorder,
shall find shelter with the law.
common.skill_text:
Ward At the end of your turn, if this follower is unevolved, deal 8 damage to 2 random enemy followers and restore 8 defense to your leader. If this follower is evolved, deal 8 damage to the enemy leader.
Evolve: Remove Ward from this follower. Give it Intimidate.

evo.flavour_text:
I am Justice, executioner of prejudice. 
This sword adjudicates through integrity.
None shall be pardoned.
evo.skill_text:
Ward At the end of your turn, if this follower is unevolved, deal 8 damage to 2 random enemy followers and restore 8 defense to your leader. If this follower is evolved, deal 8 damage to the enemy leader.
Evolve: Remove Ward from this follower. Give it Intimidate.

style_card_list.name: Stark
style_card_list.skill_text:
Ward At the end of your turn, if this follower is unevolved, deal 8 damage to 2 random enemy followers and restore 8 defense to your leader. If this follower is evolved, deal 8 damage to the enemy leader.

style_card_list.flavour_text:
I'm afraid, after all.
—Stark

style_card_list.flavour_text:
I'm afraid, after all.
—Stark

common.name: Lilith, Enchanting Succubus
common.flavour_text: It's lovely to be able to see you again so soon! Hmm? You don't ever remember meeting me? Oh, you tease! I've never forgotten about you! You're just way too cute inside those dreams of yours!
common.skill_text: Last Words: Add a Bat to your hand.

evo.flavour_text: Within that endlessly spreading dreamscape, a momentary tryst. Words of adoration and devotion spill from her lover's lips, but once the sun rises, it all dissipates with the morning mist.
evo.skill_text: Last Words: Add a Bat to your hand.

common.name: Bat
common.flavour_text:
Peer not at them. Do not chase nor approach them.
—Advice from a villager
Seek them out. Give chase and shoot.
—Advice from a hunter
common.skill_text: Drain

evo.flavour_text: To the powerless, they are an omen. To the powerful, they are a sign of the struggles to come. Run away or approach; it matters not to the lord at the center of the swarm.
evo.skill_text: Drain

common.name: Cultivator of Malice
common.flavour_text: The resilience of the humble pumpkin lends to its efficacy as a vessel for spirits. Although the pumpkin wears a smile, the phantom within never forgets its malice.
common.skill_text: Last Words: Add a Ghost to your hand.

evo.flavour_text: Pumpkins ripen even after they are harvested—as does the hate of the malevolent phantoms that occupy them. "Say your gourd-byes, darling! 'Cause you're about to get squashed!"
evo.skill_text: Last Words: Add a Ghost to your hand.

common.name: Ghost
common.flavour_text: Lingering attachments twist a soul in all manner of wicked ways, dooming them to a wretched eternity spent in darkness.
common.skill_text: Storm When this card leaves the field, banish it. At the end of your turn, banish this card.

evo.flavour_text:
What is it that the dead cannot let go of? How did they pass on? Why do they still desire to live? These are questions asked only by amateurs.
—An experienced exorcist
evo.skill_text: Storm When this card leaves the field, banish it. At the end of your turn, banish this card.

common.name: Reaper's Deathslash
common.flavour_text: Wounds left by the scythe of war fester over time, becoming borders between peoples. Wounds left by the scythe of Death are swift and clean, but leave you forever severed from the land of the living.
common.skill_text: Select an allied and enemy follower on the field and destroy them.

common.name: Devious Lesser Mummy
common.flavour_text: The dead are wrapped in pure white cloth in anticipation of the life to come. But graverobbers be warned—those well-wishes can quickly become a curse. If you do not wish to meet death's cold embrace, steer clear of the mummy's chambers.
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Give this follower Storm.

evo.flavour_text: King or peasantry? Man or even beast? The swaddling bandages mark the dead as one and the same. —Scroll of the Lich King, Final Passage
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Necromancy (4) - Give this follower Storm.

common.name: Nameless Demon
common.flavour_text: BZZT! Sorry, you lose. Seems you're not only a failure at life, but also a failure at summoning rituals. What, you thought you'd get some hotshot demon? Well too bad, you just get little ol' nameless me. I guess us failures should stick toge—hey, what's that smile?
common.skill_text: Evolve: Summon 2 copies of Bat.

evo.flavour_text: Nobodies without a name, like me, are reserved for summoners who fail the ritual... I never thought that... I would be given such a pretty name...
evo.skill_text: Evolve: Summon 2 copies of Bat.

common.name: Mino, Shrewd Reaper
common.flavour_text: Diligent at her core. Generally a high performer. Notice little outright loyalty to the netherworld, but seems to be improving in that regard. Tends to read a lot of books and produce strange sounds at the same time; overlooking as this happens off the clock.
common.skill_text:
Enhance (4): Give this follower Rush and Bane.
Last Words: Add a Skeleton to your hand.

evo.flavour_text: She does a great job of ensuring everyone's timely demise, but only when she's on the clock. She certainly values her time more than anything else, though she has been observed spending time with river ferry workers...
evo.skill_text:
Enhance (4): Give this follower Rush and Bane.
Last Words: Add a Skeleton to your hand.

common.name: Skeleton
common.flavour_text: The hero walks the path of glory, seeking honor and the spoils of war. The undead soldier walks the path of destruction, seeking nothing else. The sight of one inspires hope, while the other conveys nothing but despair.

evo.flavour_text: Numerous achievements created a life of luxury and sloth. Ironically, it was not until after he had lost his flesh and blood that the hero remembered his swordsmanship.

common.name: Beryl, Nightmare Incarnate
common.flavour_text: Everyone keeps going on about how "existence is a nightmare" or some such nonsense. Just what the hell is going on up there in the human world? Let me show you a real, true nightmare!
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to your leader.
Evolve: Restore 5 defense to your leader.

evo.flavour_text: Mortals seem to suffer under nothing but endless toil these days. That's great for my line of work, but maybe I should help them out and do something about all that. How? Oh, I have my ways!
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Deal 3 damage to your leader.
Evolve: Restore 5 defense to your leader.

common.name: Orthrus, Hellhound Blader
common.flavour_text: Takes her duties seriously, but sometimes goes a little overboard in the execution. Displays more loyalty to her mistress than the netherworld. Possesses dual natures; overlooking as it is a necessary part of her productivity.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Add 2 shadows to your cemetery.
Ward
Evolve: Necromancy (4) - Do this 2 times: "Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower."

questions.question: Will Orthrus, Hellhound Blader's Evolve ability activate even if there aren't any enemy followers on the field, provided I have at least 4 shadows?
questions.answer: Yes. It will simply consume 4 shadows.

evo.flavour_text: She is said to be either the second-highest ranking flame demon or the most useless hound in the netherworld. Perhaps that two-faced nature is part of her charm. Expect to see all manner of strange commotion as a result of her daily patrols.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Add 2 shadows to your cemetery.
Ward
Evolve: Necromancy (4) - Do this 2 times: "Deal 2 damage to a random enemy follower."

common.name: Spirited Gravekeeper
common.flavour_text: A good gravekeeper must always ensure that her guests are having a comfortable and pleasant death! Graves: cleaned! Flowers: placed! Candles... Oh. Um, sir? Excuse me sir, we kindly ask that all grave robbers and necromancers leave the premises! Hello? Sir?
common.skill_text: Enhance (7): Reanimate (5) and Reanimate (3).

evo.flavour_text: This graveyard's reputation isn't one of peace and tranquility. Nevertheless, it has a surprising number of good reviews. Says one resident: "Well, the gravekeeper here's a hard worker! The cheerful, reliable type. Makes you wanna get up and give her a hand!"
evo.skill_text: Enhance (7): Reanimate (5) and Reanimate (3).

common.name: Sham-Nacha, Heir to Entwining
common.flavour_text: Be enveloped in our love, and become our children. Behold the great entwining. Our influence spreads to the four corners of the world. Gather, my children, and be entwined. Our creed is simple: love thine equal, and together we will make our beautiful nest!
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Reduce the faith of Faith: Sham-Nacha, Heir to Entwining by 10 to give it "Increase the number of Modes you can select by 1."
Super-Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field, destroy it, and add a copy of it to your hand.

questions.question: If I use Sham-Nacha, Heir to Entwining's Fanfare ability 2 times, will the number of Modes I can select be increased by 2?
If I play Screaming and Loathing and select 2 Modes, will Sham-Nacha, Heir to Entwining's faith be increased by 2?
questions.answer: No. It will only be increased by 1.

evo.flavour_text: The world lies on the brink, but don't fret. Once our nest is complete, all the borders and wars will melt away into us—the spider who is One-in-All, who forever slumbers in our undying chambers. So weave together the ultimate nest that entwines all unto us!
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Reduce the faith of Faith: Sham-Nacha, Heir to Entwining by 10 to give it "Increase the number of Modes you can select by 1."
Super-Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field, destroy it, and add a copy of it to your hand.

common.name: Almeida, Headstrong Miner
common.flavour_text: Ever since that huge masked dude saved my hide with his big ol' scythe, I've been obsessed with its power. I'm definitely gonna make a weapon that rivals it one day!
common.skill_text:
Enhance (4): Evolve this follower and give it +1/+1.
Rush

evo.flavour_text: Well, after tons of trial and error, I forged my finest work yet! Say hello to the Vaserav Hammer! Huh? So what if I named it after the masked man... I-it's not like I'm in l-l-love with the guy!
evo.skill_text:
Enhance (4): Evolve this follower and give it +1/+1.
Rush

common.name: Support Wolf
common.flavour_text: Player, 'twas I that spirited thee to this plane. But fear not. One game shall not be the arbiter of thy fate. Indeed, we shall play until thou seizest victory. —Games with Nightblossom, No. 8
common.skill_text:
Enhance (6): Give this follower +0/+6, Bane, and Barrier.
Rush

evo.flavour_text: They desire you. You must be overjoyed, ecstatic even. But just so you know... that isn't love. It's compulsion. —Games with Nightblossom, No. 9: Lessons from the Lovers
evo.skill_text:
Enhance (6): Give this follower +0/+6, Bane, and Barrier.
Rush

common.name: Chaos Cyclone
common.flavour_text: Life is akin to the pages of a tome. Hatred anew can always be found by turning to the verses bookmarked by animosity, enmity, and malice.
common.skill_text: Select a Mode to activate. 1. Draw a follower. 2. Reanimate (2).

questions.question: Can I select Mode 2 for Chaos Cyclone even if no allied followers that cost 2 or less have been destroyed this match?

common.name: Soul Predation
common.flavour_text: Not once in your entire life have you ever sought the consent of the beasts and flora you devoured. Why should I do so now? I'm thinking it's about time to dig in!
common.skill_text: Select an allied follower on the field and destroy it. Draw 2 cards.

questions.question: Can I select a super-evolved allied follower for Soul Predation?
questions.answer: Yes. The follower won't be destroyed, but you will draw 2 cards.

common.name: Rage of Serpents
common.flavour_text:
"Oh my, how adorable!"
"You've been tormenting her again, haven't you?"
"Sis, don't you think you've gotten a bit too carried away?"
common.skill_text: Select an enemy follower on the field or the enemy leader and deal it 3 damage. Deal 2 damage to your leader.

questions.question: If I play Rage of Serpents when both leaders are at 2 defense, and I select the enemy leader, who will win the game?

common.name: Ghastly Soiree
common.flavour_text: It's customary to gather your friends and light a fire to celebrate the day of your birth, correct? What say we make the occasion even more special—by making it the day of your death!
common.skill_text: Add a Ghost, Skeleton, and Rotting Zombie to your hand.

common.name: Rotting Zombie
common.flavour_text: Corpses that move on command are always preferrable to those that operate on instinct. Never let your undead roam freely—and always remember to clean up after you are finished with them. —Necromancy for Nitwits, Chapter 1
common.skill_text: Last Words: Summon a Rotting Zombie and remove Last Words from it.

questions.question: I have a Rotting Zombie with its Last Words ability on my field. If my opponent summons 2 copies of Ominous Artifact γ and then ends their turn, will the Rotting Zombie summoned by my Rotting Zombie's Last Words ability be destroyed by the second Ominous Artifact γ's "At the end of your turn, deal 3 damage to all enemy followers" ability?
questions.answer: No. The abilities of both enemy copies of Ominous Artifact γ will activate before your Rotting Zombie's Last Words ability activates.

evo.flavour_text: Never is man closer to his primitive nature than after a visit from death. When life escapes him, instincts take over, and he turns back into what he has always been—a ravenous beast.
evo.skill_text: Last Words: Summon a Rotting Zombie and remove Last Words from it.

common.name: Winged Servants
common.flavour_text:
From his ancient castle, the vampire releases his minions and waits patiently for them to bring back supper.
"Didn't anyone teach you not to go for walks during dinner time?"
common.skill_text: Summon 2 copies of Bat.

common.name: Valiant Edge
common.flavour_text: Mandau was supposed to stay the worst afflictions of my sickness, yet I can feel the accursed magic coursing within... Dammit! I mustn't allow myself to be swallowed up by its dark maw... For everyone's sake!
common.skill_text: Deal 2 damage to your leader. Gain Crest: Valiant Edge.

common.name: Valor of the Nightblossom
common.flavour_text: Tis my turn to draw. But first, as prologue to our game, allow me to indulge in a tale from long ago. —Games with Nightblossom, No. 1
common.skill_text: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 5 damage. Add a Valor of the Nightblossom to your deck.

common.name: Tyrannical Fists
common.flavour_text: "When one lover pulls you north and another pulls you south, you cannot follow both." "Which path then do you take? Temperance lights the way to truth." —Games with Nightblossom, No. 12: Lessons from the Lovers and Temperance
common.skill_text: Deal 3 damage to all leaders with the lowest defense.

questions.question: If I play Tyrannical Fists when my leader's defense is 19 and my opponent's is 20, whose leader will take 3 damage?
If I play Tyrannical Fists when both leaders have 20 defense, whose leader will take 3 damage?

style_card_list.name: Auserlese
style_card_list.skill_text: Deal 3 damage to all leaders with the lowest defense. (This card is treated as Tyrannical Fists.)
style_card_list.flavour_text:
Auserlese.
—Aura

common.name: Rigor of the Nightblossom
common.flavour_text: Struggle. Fail. Lie spent in the dust. But as long as thy demons survive, the training will go on. I have a generous stock of games prepared—but little mercy.
common.skill_text: Gain Crest: Rigor of the Nightblossom.

common.name: Castle of Entwining
common.flavour_text: In my cave, I read my book as I sup on dew and insects. I used to be afraid of the invaders—now I can't wait for them to find me. I understand now that we all end up equal, because all lives end the same. But yours might end differently, reader...
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Select a Mode to activate. 1. Draw a card. 2. Give a random allied follower on the field +1/+1.
Engage (1): Destroy this card. Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.

common.name: Night Fiend
common.flavour_text: Most eyes are wont to open with the sunrise and shutter with moonlight's gleam. Yet, there exist eyes that gleam beneath the stars' gentle glow. Such are the eyes of the those who dare to live in darkness.
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.

evo.flavour_text:
To hunt within the shadows, one must allow the darkness inside.
—The mantra of a vampire hunter
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Deal 1 damage to your leader.

common.name: Aryll, Moonstruck Vampire
common.flavour_text: Unlike the moon, which waxes and wanes, she remains ever present throughout even the darkest of nights. Yet such a steadfast existence can be quite lonely, so she seeks a companion to keep her warm on these cold nights.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon a Bat.
Whenever an allied Bat enters the field, give it Storm and deal 1 damage to your leader.

questions.question: What does "deal 7 damage split between all enemy followers" mean?
questions.answer:
Damage split between enemies is dealt in order from oldest enemy follower on the field to newest (right to left), with each follower taking up to its defense in damage before the subsequent follower takes damage.

For example, if there are 3 enemy followers on the field with defense values of 3, 3, and 2 from right to left, they take 3, 3, and 1 damage, respectively.

evo.flavour_text: By learning each other's strengths, they laid bare their own weaknesses. So fateful was their encounter, that it rendered all other moments inconsequential—like shallow, fleeting dreams. And as the fox and demon laughed, two disasters became one calamity.
