common.skill_text: Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field with 3 defense or less and banish it. Super-Evolve: Banish all enemy followers with 3 defense or less instead.

evo.flavour_text: You wouldn't believe how many followers I've gained since I started preaching with these fists. I have the heavens to thank for allowing me to bash that wall of ignorance to dust.
evo.skill_text: Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field with 3 defense or less and banish it. Super-Evolve: Banish all enemy followers with 3 defense or less instead.

common.name: Reno, Luxwing Featherfolk
common.flavour_text: As a winged warrior, I've never considered fighting on the ground. After all, that's what the wingless are for... But when I saw that Reno girl charging forward with a sparkle in her eyes, I began to wonder. Perhaps there is some merit to fighting together...
common.skill_text:
Clash: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Super-Evolve: Give this follower "Can attack 2 times per turn."

evo.flavour_text: Why would I fly when all my friends are on the ground? Isn't there a saying about people who rush in? I guess that's me! Hm? Hey, why are you laughing?!
evo.skill_text:
Clash: Deal 1 damage to the enemy leader.
Super-Evolve: Give this follower "Can attack 2 times per turn."

common.name: Ronavero, Darkhaven Ward
common.flavour_text: Long ago, the Mad God ruled over the land with an iron fist. His tyranny ushered in an era of despair, a true dark age. But one day, from that darkness came light—a young man concealing his face with a mask. —Tale of Eight Masks, Chapter 1
common.skill_text:
Ambush
Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and destroy it.

evo.flavour_text:
Travel north to the church.
Seek the rebel inquisitor who hides himself away.
Unmask him for what he truly is—the heavenly sphere of the west.
evo.skill_text:
Ambush
Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and destroy it.

common.name: Marwynn, Despair Manifest
common.flavour_text: Open your eyes if the light does not reach them. The truest self is where impotence, frailty, and idiocy dwell. It cannot be found in the realm of dreams. Dispel the fleeting illusion, and observe reality. For this is the trial that I continue to present the world.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Add a Torrent of Despair to your hand.
Evolve: Gain Crest: Marwynn, Despair Manifest.

evo.flavour_text: The inner self is steeped in evil, so we will flood the outer world with strife. Do not indulge in saccharine dreams; know powerlessness, and despair. Salvation comes only when evil is forgotten through hardship. For this is the trial that I continue to present the world.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Add a Torrent of Despair to your hand.
Evolve: Gain Crest: Marwynn, Despair Manifest.

common.name: Torrent of Despair
common.flavour_text: Repose—the confrontation of the evil that sleeps within. Despair—the cleansing of the evil that approaches from without. In this, they are alike: you must defy them or submit.
common.skill_text: Banish a random enemy follower from the field. Delay the counts of all your crests by 1.

common.name: Sara, Graphos's Chosen
common.flavour_text: I thought that sacrificing myself for my town and for my home was what a priestess like me should do. But, through meeting everyone on this adventure, I learned something important: I am the only one that decides my fate!
common.skill_text:
Enhance (6): Give this follower +0/+10.
Ward
Evolve: Select a damaged enemy follower on the field and destroy it.

evo.flavour_text: If you want to be saved, then you need to save yourselves. Stop relying on other people. We won't sacrifice our lives for the sake of this island! Not me, and not Graphos!
evo.skill_text:
Enhance (6): Give this follower +0/+10.
Ward
Evolve: Select a damaged enemy follower on the field and destroy it.

common.name: Sophia, Zeyen Priestess
common.flavour_text: I want to help everyone, mortal or primal, to embrace their pain and learn what they can from it. That is my wish, or rather my mission, as a priestess who treads the path of Zeyen.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon a random Havencraft follower that costs 2 or less from your deck.
Super-Evolve: Give all other allied followers on the field Barrier.

evo.flavour_text: There are so many people in this world seeking salvation, and all I wish to do is help them find it. As I travel on my pilgrimage, I will save as many souls as I can... Hm? Wait... Did I lose my map to the holy grounds again?
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon a random Havencraft follower that costs 2 or less from your deck.
Super-Evolve: Give all other allied followers on the field Barrier.

common.name: Sofina, Inspiring Strength
common.flavour_text: I'm Strength, beast of vitality! Hear my roar—graaawr! Look, I get that trusting someone can be scary, but fear inspires courage—and courage inspires strength. So bet on me! You won't regret it!
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Select a Mode to activate. 1. Evolve this follower. 2. Evolve another random unevolved allied follower with Ward and give it +1/+1.
Ward At the end of your turn, if this follower is evolved, give all other followers on the field -1/-1.

evo.flavour_text: A-pa-thy.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Select a Mode to activate. 1. Evolve this follower. 2. Evolve another random unevolved allied follower with Ward and give it +1/+1.
Ward At the end of your turn, if this follower is evolved, give all other followers on the field -1/-1.

common.name: Maddening Benison
common.flavour_text:
Young girl, what you see in the sky is a mere illusion. Do not be deceived. You will not find what you desire in a fanciful mirage.
—An Al-mi'raj residing at the Lunar Temple
common.skill_text: Restore 10 defense to your leader. Gain Crest: Maddening Benison.

common.name: Blinding Faith
common.flavour_text:
The nun shuts her eyes and shines a blinding light to guide the masses.
"The existence of god is irrefutable. You need not see him to know he watches you."
common.skill_text: Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers. Enhance (8): Draw 3 cards. Restore 3 defense to your leader.

common.name: Avian Statue
common.flavour_text:
I seek wonder to soothe my sorrows.
—Worshipper of the statue
common.skill_text:
Countdown (2) Last Words: Summon a Regal Falcon.
Engage (2): Advance this amulet's count by 2.

common.name: Shining Disenchantment
common.flavour_text:
So, the Trial of Repose has been overcome. Now the Trial of Despair is at hand. The fourth Omen wields the power of reposed despair.
The Omens persist. The trials continue.
common.skill_text:
Countdown (4) Last Words: Deal 4 damage split between all enemies. Restore 4 defense to your leader.
Engage: Advance this amulet's count by X. X is the number of crests you have.

common.name: Skyfaring Vessel
common.flavour_text: I'm certain that the Grandcypher will carry you to the sky's edge. As the ship-building primal beast, I give you my personal guarantee.
common.skill_text:
Activates in hand. Whenever you Engage an amulet, reduce the cost of this card by 1.
Engage: Destroy this card. Select an unevolved allied follower on the field and evolve it.

common.name: Radiant Guiding Angel
common.flavour_text: Many are led astray by what would appear to be the most obvious of heavenly signs. Though believing all has been made clear, they may very well see their hopes dashed before their eyes.
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Draw 2 cards. Restore 2 defense to your leader.

evo.flavour_text:
Heavenly signs lead to paths fraught with trial and tribulation. Only those who endure can hope to enter the kingdom of the heavens.
"The road is not easy, but I believe in you, son of man."
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Draw 2 cards. Restore 2 defense to your leader.

common.name: Salefa, Guardian of Water
common.flavour_text:
She lies in perpetual slumber, unaware as the world passes her by. Yet even in the deepest sleep, her unwavering compassion is steadfast.
"Yawn... Still so sleepy. Salefa's not cut out for working... but Salefa's overflowing with divine power from that nap."
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Restore 3 defense to your leader.
Ward
Evolve: Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.

evo.flavour_text: In Valeria dwell four guardian deities. Amongst them is Salefa, Guardian of Water. She ensures a bountiful harvest and directs torrential downfalls toward any approaching enemy.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Restore 3 defense to your leader.
Ward
Evolve: Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers.

common.name: Immaculate Adjudicator
common.flavour_text: I find you guilty of defiling the divine's authority and hereby sentence you to death. And for defiling my robes... I have readied a separate punishment of my own.
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Select an enemy follower on the field and banish it.

evo.flavour_text: I speak for the divine. Whatever the verdict, my duty remains the same. Mere sophistry, you say? I will see you punished for your insolence.
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Select an enemy follower on the field and banish it.

common.name: Agnes, the Swiftblade
common.flavour_text: I can't discern friend from foe; everything is shrouded in fog. But I will continue to cut down any and all dubious characters until vengeance is mine. I need only my blade of retribution to guide me.
common.skill_text: Storm Strike: If there are at least 2 allied amulets on the field, destroy a random enemy follower other than the attack target.

questions.question: If a super-evolved Agnes, the Swiftblade destroys an enemy follower other than the one it's attacking with its Strike ability, will the "Whenever this follower attacks and destroys an enemy follower, deal 1 damage to the enemy leader" ability it has from super-evolution activate?

evo.flavour_text: I'm sorry if you're not Vier... But this is the end for you. A case of mistaken identity will not stop my blade. My vision might be clouded, but there's one thing that's always been crystal clear—my enemy is out there and I must strike her down.
evo.skill_text: Storm Strike: If there are at least 2 allied amulets on the field, destroy a random enemy follower other than the attack target.

common.name: Congregant of Repose
common.flavour_text:
Let's be kind to each other.
If everyone were kinder, the world would be a better place!
—The teachings of Lady Himeka
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Select an enemy follower on the field and destroy it.
Evolve: Gain Crest: Congregant of Repose.

evo.flavour_text: "Are we dreaming? To be so blessed by the word of Lady Himeka!" The fervent worshippers trembled. "From her teachings we gain sustenance. In her words we find the repose we sought." They weep with their entire bodies, and sleep no longer.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Select an enemy follower on the field and destroy it.
Evolve: Gain Crest: Congregant of Repose.

common.name: Desperate Shrinemouse
common.flavour_text: The games of the Flower Kami test your resolve. You wish to draw a card? Then discard one first. There is no gain without loss; there is no victory without blood. —Games with Mistbloom, No. 4
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Draw a card.
During your turn, whenever you draw a card, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.

questions.question: If I evolve Desperate Shrinemouse when my hand is full, will its "whenever you draw a card" ability activate?

evo.flavour_text: People cannot live their lives holding onto everything. Someday, they will experience loss and discover what is important to them. So come, at the end of our game you too shall obtain the courage to fight for your own cause! —Games with Mistbloom, No. 5
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Draw a card.
During your turn, whenever you draw a card, deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.

common.name: Saint of Rehabilitation
common.flavour_text: I pour my soul into every match. I buy victory with blood. Player... can you say the same? —Games with Mistbloom, No. 13
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Restore 1 defense to your leader.
Ward During your turn, whenever your leader's defense is restored, summon a Fox of Purity.
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability. Super-Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.

evo.flavour_text: All right, it's time for you to go all out! It's more fun and stress-free that way! And if you can't find your courage, then I'll give you the push you need to keep going! Graaawr! —Games with Mistbloom, No. 14: Lessons from Strength
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Restore 1 defense to your leader.
Ward During your turn, whenever your leader's defense is restored, summon a Fox of Purity.
Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability. Super-Evolve: Replicate the effects of this card's Fanfare ability.

common.name: Soulcure Sister
common.flavour_text: Welcome to our church's infirmary! Dearest me, I can sense just how much pain you must be in. Under the light of my holy staff, that pain is sure to go away and not to come back another day!
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Restore 5 defense to your leader.
Ward

evo.flavour_text:
A wave of her staff is all it takes to see her patients' eyes light up. The way they carry themselves forthwith, you would believe that they were never injured in the first place.
"The first tap may hurt a little, but soon the pain will be all gone!"
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Restore 5 defense to your leader.
Ward

common.name: Skullfane of Demise
common.flavour_text:
If the gods were really so perfect, then this world would not be drowned in vile filth. Yes, the gods of this world are imperfect; they may even lack flesh, and their words will sound of utter nonsense.
—The Heretical One
common.skill_text: Fanfare: Destroy all allied amulets. Deal X damage to all enemies. X is the number of amulets destroyed by this ability.

evo.flavour_text:
Family? Wealth? Hope? You've lost something precious, haven't you? Take heart; everyone here has. Be not afraid to lose even more. This whole world will soon be reduced to nothingness.
—The Heretical One
evo.skill_text: Fanfare: Destroy all allied amulets. Deal X damage to all enemies. X is the number of amulets destroyed by this ability.

common.name: Wilbert, Desolate Paladin
common.flavour_text: A dream doomed the hopeful. A vow drowned the paladin. How many lives lost to prayers in vain? How many sacrifices made for foolish wishes? Though he drowns in suffocating despair, he remains stoic—a true paladin.
common.skill_text:
Ward Last Words: Summon 2 copies of Holy Cavalier.
Evolve: Gain Crest: Wilbert, Desolate Paladin.

evo.flavour_text: To him, there was no difference between fantasy and reality. In the ocean of grief, he sinks alone. Yet no suffering could wash his myriad sins away; in everlasting despair, he bears them on his back. From Richard, a wail; from Zeno, a sigh.
evo.skill_text:
Ward Last Words: Summon 2 copies of Holy Cavalier.
Evolve: Gain Crest: Wilbert, Desolate Paladin.

common.name: Holy Cavalier
common.flavour_text: Fleshless. Purposeless. Rewardless. Yet still their selflessness endures.
common.skill_text: Ward

evo.flavour_text: Griefless. Regretless. Sinless. Their selflessness helps others endure.
evo.skill_text: Ward

common.name: Himeka, Heir to Repose
common.flavour_text: The kinder people are to me, the faster they die. Why? Maybe the world is too cruel for them to keep living. But that's okay. I know you'll save us, Lord Marwynn! I believe in you—I mean, everyone else still does!
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Gain Crest: Himeka, Heir to Repose.
Super-Evolve: Set the attack of all enemy followers on the field to 4.

evo.flavour_text: I knew you were a real god, Lord Marwynn. I'm glad I believed in you! After all, you've only let a few people die so far. That means every god I prayed to before must've been false—they couldn't save any of their worshippers at all!
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Gain Crest: Himeka, Heir to Repose.
Super-Evolve: Set the attack of all enemy followers on the field to 4.

common.name: Featherfall
common.flavour_text: Those who dwell on the lands below know gentle rains cool to the touch. Those who dwell in the skies above know piercing rains that serve only to scald.
common.skill_text: Deal 3 damage to all enemy followers. Summon a Holy Falcon.

common.name: Unholy Vessel
common.flavour_text: As faith and prayer decay, so too do the offerings. ―Chronicles of a Church's Final Days
common.skill_text: Engage: Destroy this card and all followers.

common.name: Maeve, Guardian of Earth
common.flavour_text: The earth does not provide the warmth of fire nor the soothing properties of water. It serves to support mankind, but also its wars and follies.
common.skill_text: Ward Last Words: Summon a copy of a random allied amulet destroyed this match with the highest base cost.

evo.flavour_text: In Valeria dwell four guardian deities. Amongst them is Maeve, Guardian of Earth. She cultivates the land and crushes any approaching enemy.
evo.skill_text: Ward Last Words: Summon a copy of a random allied amulet destroyed this match with the highest base cost.

common.name: Rodeo, Anathema of Judgment
common.flavour_text: An assignment must measure up to its prospects. Senseless killing is a forbidden act, a sign of inferiority. Death must be balanced by what's to be gained. Thus, his furnace-forged weapons bestow fair judgment. Only the wicked will be embraced by Thanatos.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Select a card in your hand and discard it. Summon 3 random differently named amulets that cost 3 or less from your deck.
Super-Evolve: Destroy a random enemy follower with the highest attack. Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.

questions.question: If I play Rodeo, Anathema of Judgment when it's the only card in my hand, will its Fanfare ability activate?
questions.answer: Yes. It will summon 3 random differently named amulets from your deck that cost 3 or less.

evo.flavour_text:
An Anathema whose true form is Hephaestus, Rodeo Waltair is capable of fabricating powerful items akin to magical armaments. With his eleven unique fabrications, his might in combat is unmatched.
"Myths are what gods leave behind."
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Select a card in your hand and discard it. Summon 3 random differently named amulets that cost 3 or less from your deck.
Super-Evolve: Destroy a random enemy follower with the highest attack. Deal 1 damage to all enemy followers.

common.name: Aether, Empyrean Guardian
common.flavour_text: She is the sacred goddess that binds the four guardian pillars of Valeria together. From her seat in the sky, she provides guidance on ivory wings to the people of the realm.
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon 3 random differently named followers that cost 3 or less from your deck.
Ward
Super-Evolve: Give all other allied followers on the field +0/+2 and Aura.

evo.flavour_text: Long ago, we guardians descended upon Valeria from the heavens. Since then, we have overcome many hardships with its people. The cleansing wind, warming fire, healing water, and nourishing earth may change, but our love for this nation will always remain.
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon 3 random differently named followers that cost 3 or less from your deck.
Ward
Super-Evolve: Give all other allied followers on the field +0/+2 and Aura.

common.name: Kukishiro, Mistbloom
common.flavour_text: You are in the presence of Kukishiro, Mistbloom. Challenge me, so I may carve open your chest and weigh your cowardly heart. Come—wager your life on the game. Wager everything! —Games with Mistbloom, No. 6
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Gain Crest: Kukishiro, Mistbloom. Return 2 random cards from your hand to deck. Draw 2 cards.
Rush

questions.question: I have Crest: Kukishiro, Mistbloom, and my hand is full. If I evolve Desperate Shrinemouse, will my crest's "whenever you draw" abilities activate?

evo.flavour_text: If mankind no longer wishes to play games with us, then so be it. However, dear player, I will not pardon you as such. Temporal though our relationship may be, I yet yearn for our game to continue. —Games with Mistbloom, No. 7
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Gain Crest: Kukishiro, Mistbloom. Return 2 random cards from your hand to deck. Draw 2 cards.
Rush

common.name: Sacred Griffon
common.flavour_text: Their majestic appearance should not warrant veneration from thee, but thou ought to approach them with awe just the same. —Guide to Griffon Rearing
common.skill_text: Ward Whenever you Engage an amulet, give this follower Storm.

evo.flavour_text:
All the whelps think they can become fine griffon riders. When it finally comes time to mount one, I enjoy seeing their faces lose all color.
—An experienced griffon knight
evo.skill_text: Ward Whenever you Engage an amulet, give this follower Storm.

common.name: Lapis, Shining Seraph
common.flavour_text: The heavens oft ask of man if righteousness resides in their hearts. Those who are aware of their duties will surely answer that it is so. The tribulations of this life are a test. Show me that you possess the greatest of perseverance.
common.skill_text: Last Words: Gain Crest: Lapis, Shining Seraph.

questions.question: If I already have Crest: Lapis, Shining Seraph, will Lapis's Last Words ability give me another?
questions.answer: No, you can't have more than one of the same crest.

evo.flavour_text: The heavens do not offer nectars, for only tribulation can guide one to righteousness. Only those who partake and persevere until the end will be considered the children of heaven. Thou who hast taken this great step, hear now my guidance!
evo.skill_text: Last Words: Gain Crest: Lapis, Shining Seraph.

common.name: Jeanne, Saintly Knight
common.flavour_text: The heavens are righteous—bastions of mercy and peace. Their blessings do not extend to this profane field of battle. Yet here I still stand, my will unsullied!
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Deal 6 damage to all enemy followers. Give all other allied followers on the field +2/+4.
Ward

evo.flavour_text: The heavens are just. The heavens are kind. Let those same virtues take root in your heart, for the heavens do not bless this profane field of battle. The blessings of the heavens reside in the hearts of the unsullied!
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Deal 6 damage to all enemy followers. Give all other allied followers on the field +2/+4.
Ward

common.name: Vira, Luminous Primal Knight
common.flavour_text: I feared so much... I shut all others out. Even Katalina... But that ends today. Luminiera, I surrender myself unto you!
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Select 2 enemy followers on the field and banish them. Super Skybound Art - Super-evolve this follower.
Ward Can't take more than 3 damage at a time.

evo.flavour_text: We're one person, one body now. It's the first time I've ever truly let anyone into my heart. It feels... better than I thought it would. Thanks to you, I've managed to keep sight of what's most important. Thank you, Luminiera...
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Select 2 enemy followers on the field and banish them. Super Skybound Art - Super-evolve this follower.
Ward Can't take more than 3 damage at a time.

common.name: Immovable Paladin
common.flavour_text: How can you think with others whispering into your ear? To know victory, you must first know loss. —Games with Mistbloom, No. 10
common.skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon 3 copies of Immovable Paladin.
Ward

evo.flavour_text: Throwing away your and your companions' lives isn't true courage! Here's some advice—courage is about having the strength to protect what's dear to you! —Games with Mistbloom, No. 11: Lessons from Strength
evo.skill_text:
Fanfare: Summon 3 copies of Immovable Paladin.
Ward

common.name: Elise, Electrifying Inventor
common.flavour_text: Devastation came swift and without warning. In an instant, our home was destroyed. Yet from the ashes of our land rose a new hope—a resistance movement determined to fight back against our oppressors. —The Rhomgand Resistance, Part 1
common.skill_text: Last Words: Add a Gear of Remembrance to your hand.

evo.flavour_text: Sure, I was pretty spooked seein' our home in flames, but then the Resistance gave me and everybody else a new purpose! Now I'm makin' weapons that'll set our hearts—and our enemies—on fire!
evo.skill_text: Last Words: Add a Gear of Remembrance to your hand.

common.name: Gear of Remembrance
common.flavour_text: Relics lie about us like monuments to failure, totems of regret. Yet the gears of war turn on, groaning beneath the burden of peace. —Age of Destruction, Gear of Remembrance
common.skill_text:
Fuse: Artifact amulets When you Fuse to this card, transform it into a Fortifier Artifact.
Can't be played.

common.name: Fortifier Artifact
common.flavour_text: Mortals have short memories. Thus, the gears returned to the battlefield once more, reaping the lives of innocents. —Age of Destruction, The Azure Period

evo.flavour_text: Cling to the faint light you know, and you lose the future to darkness.

evo.flavour_text:
The skies will shatter, the light will warp, and dust will consume the stars.
At the end of days, heaven's eternal eye shall gaze out and see nothing.

I am the harbinger of the end. By my hand, the streams of stars will evaporate into nothingness.

common.name: Puppet Cat

questions.question: My opponent summoned an Ominous Artifact α that's been given "Can't be destroyed by abilities" by Carnelia, Ember of Darkness's Evolve ability. If I play Jeanne, Saintly Knight, will that Ominous Artifact α be destroyed by Jeanne's Fanfare ability?
questions.answer: Yes. "Can't be destroyed by abilities" doesn't prevent damage by abilities, and followers are destroyed when their defense falls to 0.
